weeks: Week 4-5: Building RESTful APIs with Flask/Django
Week 1-2: HTML, CSS basics + layouting (Flexbox, Grid)
Week 3-4: Core JavaScript (DOM, events, fetch API)
Week 5-6: React basics (components, props, state, hooks)
Week 7-8: Build 2-3 responsive projects + deploy on Netlify/Vercel
Week 3-4: Statistics + ML basics (regression, classification, metrics)
Week 5-6: Model training with scikit-learn on real datasets
Week 7-8: Intro to TensorFlow/PyTorch + basic neural nets
Week 9-10: Model deployment basics (FastAPI/Flask + Docker optional)
Week 11-12: End-to-end ML project: data → model → API → small UI
projects: ML model served via REST API
